Text: Isn´t this a little too big torrent? I really appreciate all ds-game, but if it's possible, I think it's better to make many smaller torrents. Don't think that I critisize you, it's only a suggestion.
totomas1 > or maybe you need to learn how to use torrents. You can download each of the 4000 files by them self. you dont need to download all 4000.

Okey, Lollash, but I'm thinking like this. A torrent on 88 GB, sorry I don't download it (or parts of it), but if there were 10 torrents on 8 GB, I would download it and there would be more seeders (or rather leechers). But still, it's of course better with this one than none so keep up the good work :)
